page.title: 04Life at Popes Hill
page.content: I am writing about life in a country district in 1985. I live just behind a pub called The Greyhound Inn by the side of which is a car park but it does not just have to be used by the people who go to the pub. And just at the bottom of our gate, there is a little lane. Sometimes I walk up the lane. We own a lot of land. We have got sheep, pigs and bees and we used to have hens. I go to Westbury-on- Severn school because it is very near to us. A lot of people who live on Popes Hill to to the same school. Most of them go to school on a bus. It is good fun riding your bike down the lane because the lane is on a slope. And by our big gate there is another lane and in the winter it is fun going down on sledges. We live near a few houses but they aren't terribly near to us.
